comment: Given a function ` F ` on a well-ordered domain ` A ` there exists a subset of ` A ` such that ` F ` restricted to such subset is injective and onto the range of ` F ` (without using the axiom of choice). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
